column1: text

Title: Classic Pancakes
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups milk, 2 eggs, 2 tablespoons melted butter
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 15 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
2. In another bowl, whisk milk, eggs, and melted butter.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
4. Heat a griddle and pour batter to form pancakes.
5. Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.
6. Serve warm with syrup.

Title: Spaghetti Carbonara
Ingredients: 400g spaghetti, 150g pancetta, 2 large eggs, 50g Parmesan cheese, 2 cloves garlic, Salt, Black pepper
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 15 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted water.
2. Fry pancetta and garlic until crispy.
3. Beat eggs with Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
4. Drain pasta and mix quickly with pancetta and egg mixture.
5. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Ingredients: 2 cups broccoli, 1 cup sliced carrots, 1 red bell pepper, 1 cup snow peas, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 tablespoon minced garlic
Prep Time: 15 minutes, Cook Time: 10 minutes
Servings: 3
Instructions:
1. Heat sesame oil in a wok.
2. Add garlic and sauté briefly.
3. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
5. Serve hot with rice.

Title: Beef Tacos
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 8 taco shells, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 cup shredded lettuce, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1 packet taco seasoning
Prep Time: 15 minutes, Cook Time: 15 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. Cook beef with chopped onion until browned.
2. Add taco seasoning and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
4. Serve immediately.

Title: Tomato Soup
Ingredients: 500g ripe tomatoes, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1 tablespoon olive oil, Salt, Pepper
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 30 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
3. Add broth, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 20 minutes.
4. Blend the soup until smooth.
5. Serve hot.

Title: Grilled Chicken Salad
Ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 4 cups mixed greens, 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1/2 cup croutons, Salad dressing
Prep Time: 15 minutes, Cook Time: 15 minutes
Servings: 2
Instructions:
1. Grill chicken breasts and slice.
2. In a bowl, combine greens, cucumber, tomato, and croutons.
3. Top with grilled chicken.
4. Drizzle with salad dressing and serve.

Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup butter, 3/4 cup sugar, 3/4 cup brown sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups chocolate chips
Prep Time: 20 minutes, Cook Time: 12 minutes
Servings: 24
Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. Cream butter and sugars.
3. Add eggs, flour, baking soda, and salt.
4. Fold in chocolate chips.
5. Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet.
6. Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
Ingredients: 500g shrimp, 3 tablespoons butter, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, Salt, Pepper, Parsley
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 10 minutes
Servings: 3
Instructions:
1. Melt butter and sauté garlic.
2. Add shrimp, salt, and pepper.
3. Cook until pink.
4. Add lemon juice and parsley.
5. Serve hot.

Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients: 3 tomatoes, 1 cucumber, 1/2 red onion, 100g feta cheese, 10 olives, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
Prep Time: 15 minutes, Cook Time: 0 minutes
Servings: 2
Instructions:
1. Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and onion.
2. Combine in a bowl with olives.
3. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
4. Top with feta cheese.
5. Serve chilled.

Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients: 500g chicken, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 tablespoons curry powder, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 tablespoons oil, Salt
Prep Time: 15 minutes, Cook Time: 30 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. Sauté onion in oil.
2. Add chicken and brown.
3. Add tomatoes and curry powder.
4. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 25 minutes.
5. Serve with rice.

Title: Avocado Toast
Ingredients: 2 slices bread, 1 ripe avocado, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, Salt, Pepper, Chili flakes
Prep Time: 5 minutes, Cook Time: 5 minutes
Servings: 1
Instructions:
1. Toast bread slices.
2. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread on toast.
4. Sprinkle with chili flakes and serve.

Title: French Omelette
Ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 tablespoon butter, Salt, Pepper, Chopped herbs (optional)
Prep Time: 5 minutes, Cook Time: 5 minutes
Servings: 1
Instructions:
1. Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
2. Melt butter in a pan.
3. Pour eggs and cook gently, stirring.
4. Fold and serve with herbs on top.

Title: Veggie Fried Rice
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 2 eggs, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oil, Salt, Pepper
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 15 minutes
Servings: 3
Instructions:
1. Scramble eggs in oil and set aside.
2. Stir-fry vegetables.
3. Add rice, soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
4. Mix in scrambled eggs.
5. Cook for 5 more minutes and serve.

Title: Banana Smoothie
Ingredients: 2 ripe bananas, 1 cup milk, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1 tablespoon honey, Ice cubes
Prep Time: 5 minutes, Cook Time: 0 minutes
Servings: 2
Instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth.
2. Serve chilled.

Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients: 2 slices bread, 2 slices cheese, 1 tablespoon butter
Prep Time: 5 minutes, Cook Time: 10 minutes
Servings: 1
Instructions:
1. Butter bread slices.
2. Place cheese between bread slices.
3. Grill until golden brown on both sides.
4. Serve hot.

Title: Caesar Salad
Ingredients: 4 cups romaine lettuce, 1/2 cup croutons, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan, Caesar dressing
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 0 minutes
Servings: 2
Instructions:
1. Toss lettuce with dressing.
2. Add croutons and Parmesan.
3. Serve chilled.

Title: Baked Salmon
Ingredients: 2 salmon fillets, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, Salt, Pepper, Dill
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 15 minutes
Servings: 2
Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F.
2. Season salmon with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and dill.
3. Drizzle with olive oil.
4. Bake for 15 minutes.
5. Serve hot.

Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients: 4 potatoes, 1/4 cup milk, 2 tablespoons butter, Salt, Pepper
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 20 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. Boil potatoes until tender.
2. Mash with butter and milk.
3. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Serve warm.

Title: Caprese Salad
Ingredients: 2 tomatoes, 200g mozzarella, Fresh basil, 2 tablespoons olive oil, Salt, Pepper
Prep Time: 10 minutes, Cook Time: 0 minutes
Servings: 2
Instructions:
1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
2. Layer with basil leaves.
3. Drizzle with olive oil.
4. Season with salt and pepper.
5. Serve fresh.

Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients: 4 bell peppers, 1 cup cooked rice, 300g ground beef, 1 onion, 1 cup tomato sauce, Salt, Pepper
Prep Time: 20 minutes, Cook Time: 30 minutes
Servings: 4
Instructions:
1. Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
2. Sauté onion and beef until browned.
3. Mix with rice, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper.
4. Stuff peppers and bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.
5. Serve hot.

Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients: 1 apple, 1 banana, 1 cup grapes, 1 orange, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
Prep Time: 15 minutes, Cook Time: 0 minutes
Servings: 3
Instructions:
1. Chop all fruits.
2. Mix with honey and lemon juice.
3. Chill before serving.
